reviewText:
Sorry guy....U Suck !!!
After attempting to watch this, within first 10 minutes we realized this guy is definitely Not survival expert and filming format and style is really bad.
Not entertaining, bad filming and editing and the main guy is goofy, and not in a funny way.
No wonder this was so cheap.
Shipping, packaging, delivery good but as

As a lifelong student of survival, I very much enjoy watching real life documentaries showing what real people in real life-or-death situations do/don't do to help themselves. I watch these shows not to smirk and laugh from the safety and comfort of my living room at how stupid these people are as if I could never find myself in such circumstances, but to learn from what they did right and what they did wrong. I spend a lot of time in the wild places and in the last 50 years I've had my share of close calls from which I learned lessons that helped me later. But I prefer to learn from other people's experiences because I can benefit without paying the price they did. I'm amazed that some of them still haven't learned. One man, who had only a three foot machete with him, walked for several hours without noticing he had left it behind. He didn't go back to get this priceless tool because it meant losing several hours. But that was the wrong choice. Time would have gone by regardless. He should have asked himself if he would be better off in several hours with or without the machete, then gone back to get it. Years later, he still doesn't understand. A couple with more sense, having to walk many miles through deep snow, did not carry their baby in their arms as most parents would. Instead they packed him in a well insulated garment bag and pulled it like a sled, saving themselves much energy with this simple but clever idea. I highly recommend this DVD and this seller. Thank You!
Excellent quality delivered on time great price
